key: \C[6]Ms. Betty\C[0]
original: \C[6]Ms. Betty\C[0]

key: Now, undress.
original: Now, undress.

key: Me
original: Me

key: WHAT!? Why would I do that?
original: WHAT!? Why would I do that?

key: Hmm, you're really going to question me now??
original: Hmm, you're really going to question me now??

key: I didn't mean to, it's just... why should I take off my clothes?
original: I didn't mean to, it's just... why should I take off my clothes?
translation: 不是……我为什么要脱衣服？

key: I wanted to make sure that you didn't steal any of their underwear.
original: I wanted to make sure that you didn't steal any of their underwear.
translation: 我想确认一下你没偷东西

key: I don't have all day, take your clothes off. NOW!
original: I don't have all day, take your clothes off. NOW!

key: Yes, \C[6]Ms. Betty\C[0].
original: Yes, \C[6]Ms. Betty\C[0].

key: (I can get addicted to this. Exciting.)
original: (I can get addicted to this. Exciting.)

key: (Oh! This is what it looks like!)
original: (Oh! This is what it looks like!)

key: (Let's take a closer look.)
original: (Let's take a closer look.)

key: Me
original: Me

key: (Wow! She smells nice.)
original: (Wow! She smells nice.)

key: (It's not perfume either, just her natural body odor.)
original: (It's not perfume either, just her natural body odor.)
translation: (闻着不像是香水，应该是她的体香)

key: Are we done yet, \C[6]Ms. Betty\C[0]? It's getting weird now.
original: Are we done yet, \C[6]Ms. Betty\C[0]? It's getting weird now.
translation: 好了吗，\C[6]贝蒂小姐\C[0]？我感觉有点怪怪的

key: (Damn, she smells good. My "boy" got up a little.)
original: (Damn, she smells good. My "boy" got up a little.)
translation: (我去，她闻起来太香了，我的小弟弟要探头了)

key: (He got a semi from me walking around him. How interesting.)
original: (He got a semi from me walking around him. How interesting.)
translation: (我光绕着他走就让他兴奋了，真有趣)

key: (This is bad, I have to calm down.)
original: (This is bad, I have to calm down.)

key: (What? How did he do that?)
original: (What? How did he do that?)

key: (That won't be a problem. He's already on the edge, a little more heat... it's going to explode.)
original: (That won't be a problem. He's already on the edge, a little more heat... it's going to explode.)
translation: (应该问题不大，他已经兴奋了，稍微刺激一下……他就要上天了)

key: Oh my, it's quite hot in here.
original: Oh my, it's quite hot in here.

key: Again
original: Again

key: Next
original: Next

key: You're a pervert after all. Watching your teacher like that.
original: You're a pervert after all. Watching your teacher like that.
translation: 你真是个变态，怎么这样看着你的老师

key: I'm really sorry.
original: I'm really sorry.

key: I will forgive you this time.
original: I will forgive you this time.

key: Because you're new here, this is your first time making a mistake. I'll let you leave this time.
original: Because you're new here, this is your first time making a mistake. I'll let you leave this time.
translation: 因为你是新来的，而且是第一次犯错，这次就先让你回去了

key: But, you should be careful. Next time I will NOT go EASY on you.
original: But, you should be careful. Next time I will NOT go EASY on you.
translation: 下次我可不会这么轻易放过你了

key: Thanks, \C[6]Ms. Betty\C[0].
original: Thanks, \C[6]Ms. Betty\C[0].

key: You can leave now.
original: You can leave now.

key: Remember to put your clothes back on.
original: Remember to put your clothes back on.

key: See you later, \C[6]Ms. Betty\C[0].
original: See you later, \C[6]Ms. Betty\C[0].

key: Until next time.
original: Until next time.

key: \C[6]Ms. Betty\C[0]: \v[81]
original: \C[6]Ms. Betty\C[0]: \v[81]
